definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: His face was covered in ugly red blotch es.
sentences.chinese: 他脸上有许多难看的红色大斑点。

sentences.english: That day, he removed the male goats that were streaked and spotted.
sentences.chinese: 当天拉班就将有条纹有斑点的公山羊。

sentences.english: A school of spotted eagle rays glides gracefully through the island-speckled waters of the Maldives.
sentences.chinese: 一群斑点鹰𫚉姿态优雅的掠过马尔代夫群岛水域。

sentences.english: Her face is purple except for the white marks.
Secondly, the process for producing liquid smoking Channel Catfish block was studied.
sentences.chinese: 其次对液熏斑点叉尾鲴加工工艺进行研究。

sentences.english: A magnified shot shows the head of a tiger swallowtail butterfly larva.
sentences.chinese: 在老虎凤尾蝶幼虫的头部有一个大斑点。
腐蚀斑点属于应力集中。

sentences.english: The milkman selected the spotted cows, from among a herd of two hundred.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶商从一群200头牛中选出有斑点的牛。

sentences.english: To mark or mottle with spots.
Every humpback has a different pattern of spots, just as human fingerprints are all different.
sentences.chinese: 每头座头鲸的尾部斑点都不同，就如同人类的指纹。

sentences.english: Snow 'dappled his shoulders. His ears were red.
sentences.chinese: 他肩膀上落满斑斑点点的雪花，耳朵冻得通红。

sentences.english: Australian food fish having a pinkish body with blue spots.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚粉红身体并有蓝色斑点的食用鱼。

sentences.english: There was cool, dappled sunlight under the trees.
sentences.chinese: 树丛下很凉快，阳光只剩下斑斑点点。

sentences.english: And every fleck of russet showing clear.
sentences.chinese: 每个红褐色的斑点都很清楚。

sentences.english: For gelatinous blobs, sea anemones have a lot of personality.
sentences.chinese: 对于凝胶状的斑斑点点的海葵来说，其颇具人性。

sentences.english: Agile viverrine have a spotted coat and long ringed tail.
sentences.chinese: 敏捷的灵猫，有带斑点的皮毛和圈状的长尾巴。

definition: dark spot or blotch on the skin
